phrases: There is an emergency message from the Detention Corps!
The new Oracion Seis's aim is not the destruction of churches!
They are after Celestial Spirit Wizards who are being sheltered there!
Our top priority is finding them first and protecting them!
Suddenly gotten a lot busier around here...
After all, we have got the real one right here.
I will pass it on to Master and Lucy.
We will take this girl to a nearby hospital.
Anyway, we have got to contact Natsu and the others!
Do they have long-distance communication cards?
We got word that the Six Generals are attacking Kardia Cathedral!
None of us are over there!
If they go down together, it is convenient for me.
Still, something about it does not sit right.
I promise I will protect you!
I have been having so much fun playing with you all
that I forgot the important work I have to do!
Alright, let us do this all at once!
I got the idea from Sugar Boy's mucus!
Making like you have a beautiful friendship...
I no longer have any friends.
But people can get stronger by overcoming their sadness.
There is no way you can comprehend the pain that is in my heart.
Everyone bears pain in their heart.
We found the Celestial Spirit Wizard and have her in protective custody!
I have been so busy here, I forgot my purpose...
One of these days, we will settle this for good.
I captured the Celestial Spirit Wizard.
I am going to activate it.
Even if you sever my biological link, there are more of us...
According to the information he got out of Father Fabrizio...
At last, our prayers will be answered.
I will go along with it.
There is some kind of doubt, right?
I do not really understand how males think.
What are you talking about, the misuse of your doctrine?!
Cardinal Rapowant gave us individual missions!
That is one of the church's head honchos, right?
Dan and Mary were to interfere with you...
Sugar Boy was to stand by, prepared in case of an emergency...
She was imprisoned as a traitor to Legion!
She backed you people up or something.
Anyway, I do not know about the mission that Gatman was given.
But I have a really bad feeling about it.
when that Cleaner came out, it meant there is a disturbing movement within Zentopia.
She told him she hates cats.
Lily wears his broken heart on his sleeve...
Do not interrupt the conversation with a cooked-up drama!
The strange mission Byro-sama and I were given!
The order itself, but most especially, we were not told to get the Infinity Clock back!
Even though stopping them is the most important thing right now!
Right now, we need to join forces!
So you came here to look to Carla's precognition for help...
Even with all this, Byro-sama's allegiance has not crumbled.
You were a worthier opponent last time, Sammy!
Your techniques were aimless and misguided!
You will never be able to beat me that way.
First, you need to get rid of the hesitation that is in your heart.
No matter how many times you attack, the outcome will be the same.
In my Phantom Lord days, maybe I would have given up already,
but unfortunately for you, I am a Fairy Tail wizard now.
Even if you beat the crap outta me, my heart will not break that easily!
Thank you for buying some time, Gajeel-kun.
You think this will snare me?
You are getting tangled up with me?!
Would you let go of me, you...?!
You scatter, son of a bitch!
The timing could have been a little better, huh?
If it had been Gray-sama, the timing would have been perfect.
They took down Gatman the Cleaner...
How long are you going to sleep, Erigor?!
Do not be that violent with him...
We have got to ask him this!
Tell us what your aim is!
You just got your memories back, so you must not be thinking clearly yet.
It felt like somebody sneaked into my dream...
After that, I acted as the Grim Reaper.
Then it was probably a kind of magic that uses dreams to control people.
Little by little, it must have influenced his brainwaves and then controlled his unconscious mind.
I did as I was told, offering up my memories,
and in exchange received the magic power of mastery over weather phenomenon.
It was the hardest thing I have ever been through.
Mighty power comes at a high price,
I have no intention of throwing in with you, but let me be grateful.
When Cana used divination to decide these teams, she said something...
She said, I do not know why, but I am so sleepy...
Then unbeknownst to her, Cana-san was also manipulated through her dreams!
So right from the start, we were paired up into teams that were favorable to them!
We fell right into a trap!
Befitting of well-known Celestial Spirit Wizard, Will Neville...
Even in death, he is protected by powerful magic.
But that effect is about to run out.
I do not care what your goal is, we are not going to let you accomplish it!
You have sniffed me out already?
Brain II of the new Oracion Seis, I presume?
Hang in there just a little longer!
But she lacks the resolve to shoot someone.
In order to achieve something, you have to pay a high cost.
Lacking in readiness to lose something!
Something that does not concern you, Byro-sama.
All you have to do is carry out your mission, right?
The sin of attacking a church is too serious!
Now I cannot use my Slot Magic!
I was finally able to hit you, asshole!
Now I am going to pay you back for everything up to now!
Wing Slash of the Fire Dragon!
I have got a really bad feeling...
The scream we heard came from over here!
The Celestial Spirit Wizards' Anti-Link is complete?
The severing of the biological link.
the amplitude limiters have all been unleashed.
The nightmare that you saw is now going to...
The chaos that had been sealed away is now unleashed upon the world!
It is the beginning of the nightmare that can never be awakened from!
The end is in our hands!
The end is in our hands!
What kind of a joke is that?
The Infinity Clock was hidden right over Zentopia Cathedral.
That is the starting point of the doctrine that was sealed away from Zentopia history.
The intersection between the beginning and end of goodwill and malice.
Everything has gone as Cardinal Rapowant as well as the archbishop have commanded.
I do not care what their real intentions are and it is not necessary to know.
For the sake of the doctrine, for the sake of Zentopia...
Though it does not look good to eat...
While I was wavering, this happened?!
What is going to happen next?!
I am going to confirm the truth with my own eyes!
We have not heard yet what kind of order you and Byro got!
The Infinity Clock has begun to work.
We have to do something to stop it!
But I have my own mission to carry out.
That is to bring you back with me, Lucy Heartfilia.
After all this, what do you want with me?!
I do not understand it either.
However, it is my duty to obey.
We do not have the time for this right now!
Cannot you see what is over us?!
What are you talking about, mission?!
Even you must know what you should really be doing right now!
Byro, what are you hesitating for?
All you need is the doctrine and loyalty...
All you have to do is what you were ordered!
I was then and am now the seventh member of Oracion Seis, the brains behind the group.
Are not you one member short?
It is no longer necessary to hide it anymore.
Throw away your temporary form and reveal your true name right here and now!
You are just trying to confuse us again, are not you?!
She is like a little sister to me!
She embarked on a journey to search for me so she could deliver my father's memento!
I am not going to be taken in by that jerk's baloney!
I am a member of the new Oracion Seis.
Imitatia, mistress of mimicry and deception.
To gather the scattered pieces of the Infinity Clock, we needed all of you.
That is why I came to you, Nee-san, as Michelle Lobster.
to destroy the biological links that were spread all over
and to release the sealed-up Infinity Clock.
With that accomplished now, we only need you, Lucy-nee-san.
You are being manipulated by magic!
So it was all a lie?
Byro, carry out the order you received from Lapowant.
Take Lucy Heartfilia back with you.
I do not need you to tell me my orders, wench.
Whoever holds that gold seal has the same authority as the archbishop.
Be aware that my orders are the archbishop's orders.
It would be dangerous to let that man live.
We are going to bring him back as well.
I am sure he will be of some use, as a hostage if nothing else.
You always sleep like a log.
Recently, I have had trouble fallin' asleep.
I keep having these weird dreams.
No, I am moved that you have that kind of sensitivity, Natsu.
Alright, I am going to show you what a real nightmare is!
Sorry, I do not have that kind of sensitivity!
